messages.title: Labour Working for a Positive Future for You
messages.content: About Martyn Davis - I am the managing director of an education consultancy company. I am married and have three children. I have been involved in education for over twenty-five years, having held senior posts within further education and special needs education. As a local councillor I have successfully campaigned for improvements to services. Horsham deserves to have strong and effective representation in parliament. If elected I will be a full-time MP, working hard to achieve the best possible outcomes for the constituency.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop privatisation of the NHS and campaign for investment to make our health service the best in the world.
Campaign for affordable housing so that everybody can rent or buy a home appropriate to their needs.
Cut taxes for 24 million working people by introducing a new lower starting rate.
Support our local businesses by cutting business rates and promoting a stable and prosperous local economy.
Stand up for Horsham's residents, putting their priorities above the priorities of vested interests.

issues.economy: Support our local businesses by cutting business rates and promoting a stable and prosperous local economy.
issues.health: Stop privatisation of the NHS and campaign for investment to make our health service the best in the world.

housing.content: Campaign for affordable housing so that everybody can rent or buy a home appropriate to their needs.
